isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR CHECK LINK

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Check Link on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 32
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the cab door check link (Item 2) inside the cab door (Item 3) with threaded studs sticking through mounting holes in cab door. Install two hex nuts (Item 1) onto threaded studs of cab door check link, driver side shown. Tighten to 77 to 95 Lbf-in (8.7 to 10.7 N•m).

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. For installing cab door vapor barrier, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier on Daycab and Sleeper Cab .

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric windows and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab. If cab door is equipped with manual windows and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door check link.
